allIssues.description: Ensures every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
allIssues.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name
allIssues.summary:
Fix any of the following:
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute

allIssues.description: Ensures every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
allIssues.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name
allIssues.summary:
Fix any of the following:
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute

allIssues.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
allIssues.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes
allIssues.summary: Fix all of the following:\n  aria-label attribute cannot be used on a div with no valid role attribute.
allIssues.source: <div data-role="header-dropdown" class="eut9m mp7g_q5 m3h2_16 _13850_snykB" data-dropdown-id="message_center_dropdown" aria-label="Rozwiń menu z wiadomościami">

allIssues.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
allIssues.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  Required ARIA attribute not present: aria-expanded
allIssues.source: <input required="" type="text" autocomplete="off" name="string" role="combobox" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-controls="suggestions-listbox" data-role="search-input" placeholder="czego szukasz?" class="m7er_k4 mgn2_14 mp0t_0a m0qj_5r m9tr_5r mli8_k4 mx7m_1 m911_co mnyp_co mdwl_co mlkp_6x mefy_5r mm2b_0 mldj_0 mtag_2 msbw_2 msts_pt mgmw_wo mr3m_1 mli2_1 mh85_0 mjyo_6x mse2_40 mqu1_40 mp4t_0 m3h2_0 mryx_0 munh_0 mvrt_8 mg9e_0 mj7a_0 mh36_0 _535b5_Sviv7" autofocus="">

allIssues.description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
allIssues.help: Buttons must have discernible text
allIssues.summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have inner text that is visible to screen readers
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
allIssues.source: <button class="mgn2_14 mp0t_0a mgmw_wo mqu1_21 mj9z_5r mli8_k4 mqen_m6 l16fh mg9e_0 mj7a_0 m911_5r mefy_5r mnyp_5r mdwl_5r msa3_z4 m0qj_5r msts_n7 l3ovl lcjck e4wks mh36_0 mvrt_0 meqh_bv" data-role="header-dropdown-toggle" aria-expanded="false" type="button">

allIssues.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
allIssues.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.12 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #ff5a00, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

allIssues.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
allIssues.help: Images must have alternate text
allIssues.summary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

allIssues.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
allIssues.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled
allIssues.summary: Fix any of the following:\n  user-scalable=no on <meta> tag disables zooming on mobile devices
allIssues.source: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1,maximum-scale=1,user-scalable=no">
